issue.title: fix copyright string in three of our *.rc files

comments.body: this is talking about the names of the executables, which are still bitcoind and bitcoin-qt

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@
 #define VER_PRODUCTVERSION_STR STRINGIZE(CLIENT_VERSION_MAJOR) "." STRINGIZE(CLIENT_VERSION_MINOR) "." STRINGIZE(CLIENT_VERSION_REVISION) "." STRINGIZE(CLIENT_VERSION_BUILD)
 #define VER_FILEVERSION        VER_PRODUCTVERSION
 #define VER_FILEVERSION_STR    VER_PRODUCTVERSION_STR
-#define COPYRIGHT_STR          "2009-" STRINGIZE(COPYRIGHT_YEAR) " The Bitcoin Core developers"
+#define COPYRIGHT_STR          "2009-" STRINGIZE(COPYRIGHT_YEAR) " The Bitcoin Core Developers"
comments.body: Would it be possible to put this #define in one place instead, for example clientversion.h?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@
 #define VER_PRODUCTVERSION_STR STRINGIZE(CLIENT_VERSION_MAJOR) "." STRINGIZE(CLIENT_VERSION_MINOR) "." STRINGIZE(CLIENT_VERSION_REVISION) "." STRINGIZE(CLIENT_VERSION_BUILD)

comments.body: Didn't try, just saw that we recently had a fix for this for one file and use three.
No - it doesn't connect to the bitcoin network.
